GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v6.0.19
GSD.description:
net/mlx5e: Always clear dest encap in neigh-update-del

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit 27242e8315752ad8588c184da88f6f8817806728, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 9a5f9cc794e17cf6ed2a5bb215d2e8b6832db444. For more details please see the references link.
